00006 class RightPanel(wx.ScrolledWindow):
00007     def __init__(self, parent, params = None, size = None, color = "LIGHT BLUE", style = None):
00008         wx.ScrolledWindow.__init__(self, parent, -1, size=size, style = wx.DOUBLE_BORDER)
00009 
00010         self.parent = parent.GetParent()
00011 
00012         self.SetScrollbars(20,20,50,50)
00013 
00014         self.sizer = wx.BoxSizer(wx.VERTICAL)
00015 
00016         self.startButton = wx.Button(self, -1, 'Start')
00017         self.Bind(wx.EVT_BUTTON, self.onStart, self.startButton)
00018         self.sizer.Add(self.startButton)
00019 
00020         self.genLabel = wx.StaticText(self, -1, 'Generation 0')
00021         self.genLabel.Hide()
00022         self.sizer.Add(self.genLabel)
00023         self.sizer.Add((10, 10))
00024 
00025         # panels that display individuals from peers
00026         tCogaPanel = coga.CollaboratePanel(self, name = "top", orientation = wx.HORIZONTAL)
00027         lCogaPanel = coga.CollaboratePanel(self, name = "left")
00028         rCogaPanel = coga.CollaboratePanel(self, name = "right")
00029         bCogaPanel = coga.CollaboratePanel(self, name = "bottom", orientation = wx.HORIZONTAL)
00030         self.coga_panel = [tCogaPanel, bCogaPanel, lCogaPanel, rCogaPanel]

00032         extraSp = (20,20)

00039

00071     def onSubmit(self, e):
00072         '''
00073         Take user selection and pass it to the GA for 
00074         fitness evaluation.
00075         '''
00076         # get user input
00077         feedback = self.displayPanel.getUserInput()
00078         if feedback:
00079             # check collaborative panels to see if any genomes need to be added
00080             # to gene pool
00081             inject_genomes = []
00082             for cpanel in self.coga_panel:
00083                 inject_genomes.extend(cpanel.getPeerGenomes())
00084             print 'inject_genomes ', inject_genomes
00085 
00086             panels_to_display = gaParams.step(feedback, self.displayPanel, inject_genomes)
00087             self.display(panels_to_display)
00088 
00089             self.generation += gaParams.getVar('stepSize')
00090             self.genLabel.SetLabel('Generation %d' % self.generation)
00091     
00092 #-------------------------------------------#
00093     def onRun(self):
00094         self.startButton.Hide()
00095         self.submit.Enable(True)
00096         self.submit.Show()
00097         self.currentGen = 0
00098         self.genLabel.SetLabel('Generation 1')
00099         self.displayPanel.Show()
00100 
00101 #-------------------------------------------#
00102     def setGeneration(self, gen):
00103         self.genLabel.SetLabel('Generation %d' % gen)
00104         self.generation = gen
00105 
00106 #-------------------------------------------#
00107     def fit(self):
00108         self.parent.Layout()
00109 
00110 #-------------------------------------------#
00111     def display(self, panels_to_display):
00112         '''
00113         Takes a list of panels to display to be evaluated.
00114         '''
00115         displayPanel = self.displayPanel
00116         displayPanel.clear()
00117 
00118         expandFlag = bool(gaParams.getVar('expand'))
00119         displayPanel.addPanels(panels_to_display, expand=expandFlag)
00120         displayPanel.fit()
00121 
00122         self.fillCoGAPanels()
00123 
00124         self.Layout()
00125 
00126 #-------------------------------------------#
00127     def fillCoGAPanels(self):
00128         '''
00129         Request genomes from peers to be displayed on collaboration
00130         panels.
00131         '''
00132         peer_list = gaParams.peer_list
00133         peer_num = min(4, len(peer_list))
00134         panel_counter = 0
00135         row_size = gaParams.getVar('rowSize')
00136         peer_genome = []
00137         # for every peer, ping it, if alive then
00138         # get pickled genomes and draw them in the coga panels
00139 
00140         status = []
00141         for peer in peer_list:
00142             if peer.online():
00143                 genome = peer.proxy.getGenomes()
00144                 genome_objs = loads(genome)
00145                 peer_genome.append(genome_objs)
00146                 to_display = row_size
00147                 if self.coga_panel[panel_counter].orientation == wx.HORIZONTAL:
00148                     to_display += 2
00149                 self.coga_panel[panel_counter].drawGenomes(genome_objs[:to_display])
00150                 panel_counter += 1
00151                 status.append([peer.getName(), 'online'])
00152             else:
00153                 status.append([peer.getName(), 'offline'])
00154 
00155         self.parent.peerStatus(status)
00156 
00157         if peer_genome:
00158             # fill the rest of the empty coga panels with
00159             # remaining genomes, if any
00160             leftover = []
00161             for genome in peer_genome:
00162                 leftover.extend(genome[row_size:])
00163             random.shuffle(leftover)
00164 
00165             for panel in self.coga_panel[panel_counter:]:
00166                 to_display = row_size
00167                 if panel.orientation == wx.HORIZONTAL:
00168                     to_display += 2
00169                 panel.drawGenomes(leftover[:to_display])
00170                 del(leftover[:to_display])
00171 
00172 
00173         #for i in xrange(peer_num):
00174         #    if peer_list[i].online():
00175         #        genome = peer_list[i].proxy.getGenomes()
00176         #        genome_objs = loads(genome)
00177         #        peer_genome.append(genome_objs)
00178         #        panels = gaParams.draw(self.coga_panel[panel_counter], genome_objs[:row_size])
00179         #        self.coga_panel[panel_counter].addPanels(panels)
00180         #        panel_counter += 1
00181 
00182         self.peer_genome = peer_genome
00183 
00184 #-------------------------------------------#
00185     def onStart(self, event):
00186         self.parent.onRun(event)
